Reviews.Title: Camera in a Nice Package
Reviews.Author: Soumen
Reviews.Content: I got the camera in a big nice package with all the items & camera properly packed.Camera is working perfectly ok. All the parts sent as part of the deal is nice & new as promised by Big Value.I strongly this retailer to everyone else.

Reviews.Title: Works great except a few items were missing
Reviews.Author: RyanR.
Reviews.Content: Everything arrived five days early. The camera, SD card, everything works great except a few items were missing from my kit that I ordered. I'm missing1- Lens/LCD Cleaning Kit1- Mini Table Size Tripod1- Pack of LCD Screen Protectors.I managed to grab this deal at a price of $812. You can't complain when the camera is $850.00 and you get that at a cheaper price and get all this other stuff for free basically.Another reason I downgraded it one star was because of the level of cheapness that some of the items were. The lens aren't entirely that great but do the job until you get canon ones, I got an olympus bag (not a canon bag), The SD card reader fell apart on me during the unboxing.I'll upload an unboxing of this kit soon so you can see that this is a legit deal in case you're thinking about buying it.Update:/ 4/21/12: I received my missing parts days after I complained. The package was in a small case and was a simple mistake. I give them back another star for their quick customer service.Ryan

Reviews.Title: ED
Reviews.Author: ed
Reviews.Content: This product was given as a gift, when I opened the box everthing was packed in great condition, the camera took great pictures and the battery lasted several hours on continual shooting

Reviews.Title: Present for my wife!!
Reviews.Author: Daniel E. Jones
Reviews.Content: This was a great purchase as this product is easy to use and still get a photographer grade picture.  It is really just point and shoot.  I can't imagine what we would be able to do if we actually take a class with it.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: M. Robles
Reviews.Content: I can't say enough about the camera as far as the quality of the images produced and the functions you get. It is a great entry level DSLR packed with amazing features at a very reasonable price. In fact the price is so close to a point a shoot digital that it is almost a no brainer for the average Joe/Jane.The body is plastic compared to professional grade Canon cameras which makes it feel lighter than say the 60D. This is a plus if you like light weight cameras, but does leave you feeling cheated when holding the 60D in another hand. Still the flip out screen, HD video and easy to use interface makes this an amazing deal.As for the bundle, the only thing I really value is the memory card, filters, and the extra battery. Everything else is very poor quality and the tripod is a hazard. If you can get just the Battery/Memory bundle do that and save some money for higher quality supportive accessories. I recommend Magic Lantern installed for those wanting to maximize the functionality of this camera.

Reviews.Title: Love My Cannon!
Reviews.Author: Rashida Scott
Reviews.Content: My bundle arrived 4 days after I ordered it. Everything came neatly packed in the box and works great. The extra battery came fully charged, so I could use it right away. The camera's image quality is amazing. I would recommend to everyone, especially if you can find this bundle for a great price like I did.

Reviews.Title: Canon T3i kit
Reviews.Author: Shad314
Reviews.Content: Everything was great for the price.. Probably could've done without the two extra lenses. Not sure if ill use the macro and wide angle. Tripod is cheap but it'll do!! I was very happy with my purchase

Reviews.Title: Exactly as Advertised
Reviews.Author: cru
Reviews.Content: This kit came with everything shown. I was a bit wary because it seemed like a great deal, but everything was perfect. The case and tripod are not sturdy or high quality, but they come in a kit, so that's to be expected.

Reviews.Title: GREAT BUY!
Reviews.Author: DAYTON REALTOR
Reviews.Content: The package was shipped and was delivered to my door in 3 days from order. The package was padded well with all of the items as displayed. For the value, this is a great package. the lens' are good quality, though bring a shadowed corners due to the aperature..  The case was smaller than anticipated so a seperate bag had to be ordered. Overall, a great experience!

Reviews.Title: Excelent!
Reviews.Author: Santicus
Reviews.Content: Super complete, the extra batery is very useful. The extra lens are fine, the are not amazing, but it's ok.The camera is amazing.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: oneil bunting
Reviews.Content: i love this camera, the video capability and quality is amazing. i would recommend it to anyone want to start in the field of still photography as a start off camera.

Reviews.Title: awesome quality photos
Reviews.Author: Kapy eventos
Reviews.Content: love it!, awesome quality pictures and easy to used.nice kit, only bad thing its the extra battery dint work it all!

Reviews.Title: Review
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my daughter for Christmas for her camera. It is a nice complete set, everything she would need. This camera takes amazing pictures.

Reviews.Title: Awesome product
Reviews.Author: Kayode Akojenu
Reviews.Content: This product is great. It came on time and it works well. The only thing I am not too trilled about is the bag but for the price I will take it.

Reviews.Title: eh
Reviews.Author: benzido
Reviews.Content: Camera is good but everything else is off brand. i took another's advice and just bought the camera buy itself and started buy products for it. defineitly better. you spend a little bit more money but you get better quality stuff. i like bundles but just like anything you pay a lot for good products and id rather do that and know ive got something good

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: Melinda Gibson
Reviews.Content: Gave this as a gift to my son for Christmas and he seems to enjoy it.I would order it again.

Reviews.Title: no camera
Reviews.Author: billie bryant
Reviews.Content: where is camera? not yet received & have been told three different stories? why is it you need more words to explain your inepness?

Reviews.Title: What a great camera!
Reviews.Author: Bruce Whalen
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my son to start his photo/filming career and college studies in the field. He loves it and has been shooting all the time since he got it. Only part of the package that wasn't what we expected was the bigger tripod. It's very lightweight and won't take alot of use. But this one small issue isn't enough to rate this package as anything less than 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: Satisfied Grandma
Reviews.Content: The camera is fantastic, and you get a lot of really nice extras in the package.  Can't go wrong with this!

Reviews.Title: Off brand extras
Reviews.Author: Gabrielle
Reviews.Content: I was under the impression everything was Canon.. The extra pieces and the bag is not. The attachment lens is mainly black when I zoom out. The tripod is SUPER cheap but of course will do.. but I am really disapointed.

Reviews.Title: EXCELENTE PRODUCTO; SE PUEDE CONFIAR EN EL VENDEDOR
Reviews.Author: Maria Fernanda Gil
Reviews.Content: me llego la camara en excelente condiciones, con todos los articulos que nombran y caracteristicas de estas, se encuentra todo en un buen estado y pude disfrutrar muy bien mi producto , muy recomendado por mi persona.. :)

Reviews.Title: Awesome deal
Reviews.Author: Theresa Oberlohr
Reviews.Content: After shopping around in stores and online I found this deal! Great price with high quality items. I'm just a momma with 3 teenagers, which means I will have a lot of special occasion pictures to take and my older point and shoot cameras just weren't up for the task. I love the swivel LCD screen for taking low shots, and the extra lenses that come in his bundle are well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: beginner camera
Reviews.Author: Nancy Campbell
Reviews.Content: recommend for the beginner photographer.was a chrismas present for our teenager daughter who wants to be a photographer and this a great starter and helps giver her great ideas at a great price. Nice pics

Reviews.Title: amezing
Reviews.Author: RANGAN
Reviews.Content: very good product. this is a professional photographer camera. its function is nice, works great. this is great deal and easy to use. kit include full size tripod. but camera bag is very bad and not suitable

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Kit!
Reviews.Author: David Schmidt
Reviews.Content: This kit includes everything you need and nothing you don't!! This was my wifes Christmas present and she hasn't put the thing down since she got it. I am surely glad film has gone the way of the Dodo.

Reviews.Title: canon t3i kit
Reviews.Author: ryan
Reviews.Content: eaverything was there that was promised and in good condition. The camera is great, we love it and would recommend to friends.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: zen
Reviews.Content: When I bought this the camera alone was just under the price of this whole package, I bought it for my gf, but I did play with it for a little beforehand. I'm electronically stunted and even I could figure it out. The accessories are off brand, but they seem to be fine as I can tell.

Reviews.Title: Most bundle items are waste
Reviews.Author: Muhammad Saleem
Reviews.Content: I noticed most of the bundle items are just waste and would never be used. Additional items if needed can be purchased seprately. Let me tell you bag is very very cheap and it not more than $5 on walmart. Only useful and immediate use stuff is tripod and sd card. I paid almost $120 more for bundle items which I think is not worth it. Seller never responded on bag quality.

Reviews.Title: Worth of Price
Reviews.Author: Canon Cam
Reviews.Content: I would give three stars as Camera is worth...all three stars goes to T3i.......the accessories came along the package are not very useful. No. of accessories is increase to sell the product...Seller is good....I had prompt reply from the seller for my queries

ProductInfo.Features:
18.0 MP CMOS sensor and DIGIC 4 Image Processor for high image quality and speed.
ISO 100 - 6400 for shooting from bright to dim light.
Improved EOS Full HD Movie mode with manual exposure control, expanded recording with new Movie Digital zoom
3.0-inch Vari-Angle Clear View LCD; Built-in flash; Full HD movie mode at 1920 x 1080 resolution
Compatible with full line of Canon EF and EF-S lenses
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera and DIGIC 4 Imaging with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Lens +58mm 2x Telephoto lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens (3 Lens Kit!!!!!!) W/32GB SDHC Memory+ Extra Battery/Charger + 3 Piece Filter Kit + Full Size Tripod + Case +Accessory Kit !
